overview: The sequel to the award-winning Babysitting the Baumgartners (2016). Doc and Carrie Baumgartner invite another couple into their bedroom for all types of naughty fun, including a swinging foursome. Meanwhile, their former babysitter Ronnie is seeing her roommate Gretchen, her buff trainer Vince, and another couple all at the same time. It's another wild and crazy adventure with the Baumgartners.
title: Adventures with the Baumgartners
